response.answer_text: Endpoint Security Software | SentinelOne is a software company that specializes in “Endpoint Protection”. This is a term of art in security software that implies that it covers not only computers (desktop, portables, servers) but also smart phones and tablets. SentinelOne promises to protect the systems it runs on against all kinds of security threats (malware, phishing attacks, viruses and a lot more). Endpoint security is only one aspect of a good overall computer security system for an enterprise. Its important but not in itself sufficient. So they are a computer security software company. Frankly, I’ve never heard of them before but I’m not a security guy. A2A: “Endpoint security is only one aspect of a good overall computer security system for an enterprise. Its important but not in itself sufficient.”

Sentinleone is a cybersecurity company that makes an Endpoint security solution. The company is unique in the sense that it provides comprehensive security using just one unified agent. In addition, the company provides MDR (managed detection and response) service, an IoT security solution utilizing existing endpoint agents and a cloud-security solution.
